mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,IFNULL(t2.collectCount,0) collectCount FROM( SELECT c1.*,IFNULL(c2.`STATUS`,'2') checked FROM t_t_favorites c1 LEFT JOIN t_t_collect c2 ON c1.ID= c2.FID AND c1.UID=#{vo.uid} AND c2.`STATUS`='1' AND c1.`STATUS`='1' AND c2.TID=#{vo.tid}) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(c.TID) collectCount, FID FROM t_t_collect c WHERE UID=#{vo.uid} AND c.STATUS='1' GROUP BY c.FID) t2 ON t1.ID= t2.FID ORDER BY t1. CREATEDATE DESC
